item.title: Testing network graphs using D3
item.description: I was working on the igraph package in R at work a couple of weeks ago and although it did the job, it lacked a bit of a visual presence. Thought Iâ€™d have a look at D3 Network graphs. Looks promising thus far! Enjoying the interactivity of the nodes. library(networkD3) data(MisLinks) data(MisNodes) forceNetwork(Links = MisLinks, Nodes = MisNodes, Source = "source", Target = "target", Value = "value", NodeID = "name", Group = "group", opacity = 1) {"
